abstract: A lockout in a contract dispute affects about 465 workers at an Electro-Motive locomotive factory in London, Ontario, that Caterpillar acquired in 2010.
snippet: A lockout in a contract dispute affects about 465 workers at an Electro-Motive locomotive factory in London, Ontario, that Caterpillar acquired in 2010.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — A lockout late Sunday of about 465 workers at a Canadian locomotive factory owned by a Caterpillar unit has renewed debate in Canada about the labor impact of foreign ownership.

headline.main: Caterpillar Locks Out Workers in Canada
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Locks Out Workers In Canada
